description: "They are children of God and have a right to a family," Pope Francis says in a new documentary.
title: Pope Francis indicates support for same-sex civil unions
title_page: Pope Francis indicates support for same-sex civil unions - BBC News
maintext: But is this really a fundamental change by the pontiff - or more an off-the-cuff statement by a leader of the Catholic Church who has been known to flirt with liberal sentiments in the past, only to fall back on traditional doctrine when push comes to shove?
